channel.title: BUpolitics
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUpolitics, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Tech, Media & Telecom Roundup: Market Talk
item.description: Find insight on PLDT, Malaysia’s tech sector and more in the latest Market Talks covering the Tech, Media & Telecom sector.

item.title: Who is ahead in Harris vs. Trump 2024 presidential polls right now?
item.description: Check out The Washington Post’s presidential polling averages of the seven battleground states most likely to determine the outcome of the election.

item.description: Interest rate cut "is not a declaration of victory, it’s a declaration of progress."

item.title: Janet Yellen Defends Her Record – and Delivers a Warning
item.description: The Treasury secretary is defending her legacy — and warning that the stability of the U.S. economy is at stake.

item.title: California's Gavin Newsom Vetoes Controversial AI Safety Bill
item.description: The governor is seeking more encompassing rules than the bill opposed by OpenAI and Meta, and supported by research scientists.

item.description: Biden is determined to convince a skeptical public that he strengthened the economy.
